sections.heading: seat; site; surveying; platting
sections.text: Such lands shall be surveyed into lots, squares, streets and alleys, and platted and recorded in the county clerk's office; and lots necessary for public buildings shall be reserved by the board for that purpose.SourceG.S.1873, c. 12, ยง 86, p. 230;R.S.1913, ยง 920;C.S.
